title: Environmental land management schemes: progress update

content.text: Yesterday, Rt Hon Mark Spencer MP, Minister for Food, Farming and Fisheries and Janet Hughes, Programme Director, Future Farming and Countryside Programme appeared before the Environment, Food and Rural Affairs Committee.
The session was part of a committee inquiry into the rollout of the new environmental land management schemes.
Questions from members were wide-ranging and addressed:
Watch the session on Parliament TV.
